item.title: England offer glimpse of attack without Kane vs. Serbia
item.description: England didn't play their best vs. Serbia until Harry Kane was withdrawn.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United turn to Dortmund's Adeyemi
item.description: Borussia Dortmund forward Karim Adeyemi is on the radar of Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Maye keeps NFL-best Pats hot amid 'MVP' chants
item.description: Drake Maye heard chants of "MVP" after leading the Patriots to a 27-14 win over the Jets on Thursday night that boosted them to an NFL-best 9-2 record...

item.title: Yankees' Judge edges Raleigh, wins third AL MVP
item.description: Yankees slugger Aaron Judge beat out Mariners catcher Cal Raleigh to defend his AL MVP title.

item.title: Dodgers' Ohtani becomes 4-time unanimous MVP
item.description: Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani won his fourth MVP in five seasons, all of them in unanimous fashion, beating out the Phillies' Kyle Schwarber and the Mets...
